acf.page_content:
NewFound Partners (NFP) is a Houston-based, value add commercial real estate firm led by John Leggett and Brad Elmore. Active in development and income-producing properties, NFP invests in traditional and specialized real estate classes in high-growth markets.  NFP’s portfolio spans hospitality, industrial, retail, office, multifamily, and mixed-use developments, along with solar and battery power storage.

NFP’s principals personally invest in all projects and are meticulous in selecting and managing investments. Our data-driven approach allows us to quickly analyze opportunities and stay ahead of trends, while our creativity provides for multiple exit and monetization strategies.  As a result, NFP delivers extraordinary returns throughout the last decade for our partners and co-investors.
acf.principals_content:
Skilled in both commercial and residential real estate, the NewFound Partners team has more than fifty years of combined experience and is “all hands-on” throughout the investment process.

Our objective is to secure profitable investment opportunities, minimize risks and deliver above-market returns all while improving and enhancing the communities where we invest.
